story_prompt: You wake up in the middle of the night, your arm hangs over the side of your bed. It’s pitch black & your room is shrouded in deep shadow. Something unseen seizes your hand. You grasp it tightly, knowing that first impressions are important & a firm, confident handshake establishes dominance.
output:
But then it pulls you towards the wall. You try to hold on to the bedpost for support, but it’s too late. Your body slides across the room & you hit the floor hard, knocking the wind out of yourself. When you open your eyes, you find yourself trapped under a large bookshelf, your hand still caught in the grip of an invisible entity. The thing slowly drags you toward the door, its power irresistible like an undertow.
A) What do you see and feel as you’re being dragged across the floor?
B) What thoughts race through your mind?
C) How do you finally escape this paranormal phenomenon?

Hint: Think of how you can incorporate sensory details, the five W’s, & figurative language.

I can't wait to read what you come up with!
